value.name: Family of woman killed by Modesto police in 2016 files $10M lawsuit against city
value.description: Officer fired, charged in another shooting Lamantia was fired from his job in March after fatally shooting Trevor Seever in December on the grounds of the Church of the Brethren in west Modesto.

value.description: The Modesto City Council on Tuesday, April 27, 2021, sang a belated "Happy Birthday" to Trevor Seever, an unarmed man shot and killed by Modesto police in December. His death has sparked outage ...
